contact_information.personal_website: no personal email added, placeholder for future update

professional_summary.summary: I started my rabbit hole of technology around the time I was 8-9 years old. I got my first personal device, an iPod Touch Gen2. Having ADHD and a mind for wanting to see how things work, I took a look into the settings and found all sorts of different options. Taking this into account I had to know more. I'm 22 years old and have been learning the basics of everything in today's tech consumed world so I can be prepared for more.

skills.specializations: I specialize in code/web surfing and debugging. I write scripts to analyze data visually in an appealing, information-conveying way. This includes but isn't limited to: colors, numbers, text, fonts, graphs, and pie charts.

experience.description: Worked under the Head Network Administrator Mr. Black. Repaired student laptops and rewired the facility.
Built Nissan Titans and Frontiers on the production line. Learned TIG welding, processed inventory assets, and managed supply replacement of parts and wearables.
Performed oil changes, brake fluid services, and learned critical information about vehicles. Ran 25-30 cars a day.
Performed oil changes, tire rotations, and managed cars in the lot and shop. Received a sign-on bonus but not the promised raise.
Worked inventory management, kept the shop clean and up to date on supplies, assisted technicians, and checked cars in and out.

achievements.title: First in District's Congressional App Challenge
achievements.description: Application was displayed in Washington D.C. at the Capital Building for a year.

personal_projects.project_title: Intro to Mechanical Engineering Course Project
personal_projects.description: Created a scale model of the school grounds from scratch. Modeled buildings in Blender at a 350:1 scale. Display includes working lights and a rising flag.

hobbies_and_interests.description: I love to drive. Backroads or from a dig, you name it. Convoys to the beach with friends is one of my favorite things to do.
